msg.msgText:
A "SNMPTrapSubscriber" object can be created by using the "create" option of the "imaserver" command. Trap subscribers represent the SNMP clients that are used to communicate with the SNMP agent embedded on the appliance. SNMP trap subscribers must be existing SNMP clients. Configure your SNMP client to receive traps before creating the trap subscriber.
SYNTAX: imaserver create SNMPTrapSubscriber help imaserver create SNMPTrapSubscriber "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver create SNMPTrapSubscriber "Host=9.3.179.144" "ClientPortNumber=1234" "Community=MonitoringServer"
Configuration items for the "SNMPTrapSubscriber" object: Host The host of an existing SNMP client ClientPortNumber The port on which the SNMP client is listening for trap information. Community The community the trap subscriber belongs to

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command help.
